TEXT.TITLE: THERMO ELECTRON <TMO> CONSIDERS UNIT STAKE SALE
TEXT.BODY: Thermo Electron Corp said it has entered into talks with underwriters on the possible public sale of a minority interest in its packaged cogeneration systems subsidiary, Tecogen Inc. The company also said it plans to offer convertible subordinated debentures publicly. It gave no further details. Reuter
